app.title: Break Time!
app.away: I'm stepping away for a second.

hot-keys.name: Change Hotkeys
hot-keys.hint: Change the hotkeys that this module uses

auto-pause.name: Automatically Pause
auto-pause.hint: Automatically pause when opening up the Breaktime window

show-button.name: Show Button
show-button.hint: Show button on players list window

break-sound.name: Break Sound
break-sound.hint: Sound to play when a break is initiated

end-break-sound.name: End Break Sound
end-break-sound.hint: Sound to play when the break time is up

volume.name: Volume
volume.hint: Volume that the break time sound plays at

notify-option.name: Notification
notify-option.hint: How to notify others when you are away

break-time.name: Default Time
break-time.hint: Default time to use as a placeholder when setting a time

break-playlist.name: Break Playlist
break-playlist.hint: Playlist to play when a break is initiated

auto-start-time.name: Auto Break Time
auto-start-time.hint: Automatically start the timer when break is started

hotkey.label: BreakTime, Pause Key
hotkey.description: Use this key to activate BreakTime
